name: Space Strike: Impossible
description:
This is my modified 2D Shooter Project: Space Strike Impossible!
Modifications:

1. Added a new enemy type. Spins and shoot bullets very fast, offering quite the challenge to overcome.

2. Two new levels designed to be very hard. Transforms the game into a bullet-hell style game that will take multiple attempts to complete for all but the most experienced players.

3. New menu minigame! The player can now move the ship around in the menu. In addition to just looking better with a background, the small amount of interactivity adds a nice touch to the originally boring menu.

By TJ Meyer
